text:
Humio | Stockholm, Sweden or Aarhus, Denmark | Onsite or Remote | Elm Frontend Developer

Humio is a fast and flexible logging platform. It is available for self-hosting or as SaaS. Humio is compatible with most popular open-source data shippers (Fluentd, Rsyslog, FileBeat, etc.) so it is easy to adopt or migrate to from other platforms like ElasticSearch ELK. The simple yet powerful query language feels familiar to most developers, and works on any data format - structured or unstructured.

We are one of the biggest Elm codebases in the world.

You will be working with:

* Elm * GraphQL * Javascript * Scala * Go * UX

Apply at: https://www.humio.com/career
